ResearchProjectDef.label: nutrient paste
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build nutrient paste dispensers which efficiently produce edible meals from raw nutritive feedstocks.

ResearchProjectDef.label: solar panels
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build solar panels for electrical generation.

ResearchProjectDef.label: air conditioning
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build air conditions to cool rooms in the heat, or to keep freezers.

ResearchProjectDef.label: autodoors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build autodoors which open to permit movement without slowing anyone down.

ResearchProjectDef.label: hydroponics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build hydroponics tables to rapidly grow crops indoors regardless of the terrain or weather outside.

ResearchProjectDef.label: electric smelting
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build electic smithy and smelters.\n\nThe electric smithy allows smithing items without fuel. The electric smelters uses heat and strong electromagnets to extract useful metal from slag chunks and other items.

ResearchProjectDef.label: electric cremation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build crematoriums which can vaporize unwanted corpses.

ResearchProjectDef.label: colored lights
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to construct colored lights for decorative purposes.

ResearchProjectDef.label: machining
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build machining tables to craft guns and machinery or disassemble dead mechanoids.

ResearchProjectDef.label: mortars
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to build mortars which can lob shells long distances over walls.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Explosive IEDs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to build improvised explosive device-based traps from artillery shells.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Incendiary IEDs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to build incendiary explosive traps from artillery shells.

ResearchProjectDef.label: microelectronics basics
ResearchProjectDef.description: The basics of working with delicate, complex electronics. This unlocks the high-tech research bench, comms console, and other research projects like tube televisions, and cryptosleep caskets.

ResearchProjectDef.label: tube television
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the production of tube televisions.

ResearchProjectDef.label: gun turrets
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the production of automated gun turrets.
